about_the_game:
"The Story Page" offers you to plunge into the atmosphere of medieval fantasy filled with role-playing elements. You will have to engage in various activities, ranging from fishing and farming, to managing taverns, castles and even entire cities. Economic mechanisms are waiting for you, allowing you to build your own business in this world. Or maybe you will choose the path of a mercenary or become part of the city guard? Or perhaps you are interested in criminal activity? Here you are free to choose and create characters using flexible settings to enjoy life in this amazing world.

This project is an MMORPG in an open world with public servers, but with the possibility of a cooperative experience (small groups of friends can create their own lobbies without connecting to the servers). My goal is to combine the role–playing component with dynamic battles, where the players themselves influence the development of the plot and the course of events.

Dialogues

A dialog system with the possibility of various ramifications and response options

Cooking and crafting

Extract resources, grow, collect and create new items from meat stew to elegant sword.

NPC's daily routine

Each NPC has a daily routine for his life. They work, sleep, relax, communicate with each other, and react to the actions of the player and creatures aggressive to them.

Magic

Destroy your enemies with rare and powerful magic. The variety will surprise you: from a simple fireball to a sphere that slows down time inside itself.

Fight with your friends

The game combines the ability to connect to shared servers, as well as a separate cooperative game for those who want to play only with friends and do not want to see other players.

Trading

Trade with other players and NPCs.

content_descriptors.notes: This game takes place in a fictional medieval world. The player participates in battles and battles and can kill or destroy enemies and characters of other players using swords, axes, bows and other melee and ranged weapons. The game shows the effects of blood. The text of the game may contain moderately rude expressions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400F / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • DirectX: Version 12
